48 class EkfSlam
49 {
50 public:
51  EkfSlam(ros::NodeHandle &nh)
52  {
53 
54  // GOOD TimeSynchronizer
55  aruco_sub_.subscribe(nh, "stereo_pair/markers", 100);
56  odom_sub_.subscribe(nh, "odom", 100);
57  sync.reset(new sync_policy_(aruco_sub_, odom_sub_, 10));
58  sync->registerCallback(std::bind(&EkfSlam::ekfCallback, this, std::placeholders::_1, std::placeholders::_2));
59 
60  //initialize current position to 0
61  current_state_ << 0, 0, 0;
62  }
63 
65  Eigen::VectorXd eigenMeans(std::vector<Eigen::VectorXd> &data)
66  {
67  Eigen::VectorXd means(data[0].rows());
68  for (unsigned i = 0; i < means.rows(); i++)
69  {
70  means(i) = 0;
71  }
72  // check if not empty
73  if (!data.empty())
74  {
75  // sum of peers
76  for (unsigned i = 0; i < data.size(); i++)
77  {
78  for (unsigned j = 0; j < data[0].rows(); j++)
79  {
80  means(j) += data[i](j);
81  }
82  }
83  // mean
84  for (unsigned i = 0; i < data[0].rows(); i++)
85  {
86  means(i) /= data.size();
87  }
88  }
89 
90  return means;
91  }
92 
94  double computeEigenCovariance(int &x, int &y, std::vector<Eigen::VectorXd> &data)
95  {
96  Eigen::VectorXd componentMeans = eigenMeans(data);
97 
98  double covxy;
99  double sum;
100 
101  for (unsigned i = 0; i < data.size(); i++)
102  {
103  sum += (data[i](x) - componentMeans(x)) * (data[i](y) - componentMeans(y));
104  }
105  covxy = sum / (data.size() - 1);
106  return covxy;
107  }
108 
110  void ekfCallback(const cares_msgs::ArucoMarkers::ConstPtr &aruco_marker, const nav_msgs::Odometry::ConstPtr &msg)
111  {
112 
113  geometry_msgs::Pose2D pose2d;
114  pose2d.x = msg->pose.pose.position.x;
115  pose2d.y = msg->pose.pose.position.y;
116 
117  tf::Quaternion q(
118  msg->pose.pose.orientation.x,
119  msg->pose.pose.orientation.y,
120  msg->pose.pose.orientation.z,
121  msg->pose.pose.orientation.w);
122 
123  tf::Matrix3x3 m(q);
124  double yaw, pitch, roll;
125  m.getEulerYPR(yaw, pitch, roll);
126  // Get the matrix represented as euler angles around YXZ, roundtrip with setEulerYPR.
127  // yaw Yaw around Z axis
128  // pitch Pitch around Y axis
129  // roll around X axis
130 
131  pose2d.theta = pitch;
132 
133  //check if the robot has move
134  if (((pose2d.x > current_state_(0) + current_state_changed_threshold_) || (pose2d.x < current_state_(0) - current_state_changed_threshold_)) ||
135  ((pose2d.y > current_state_(1) + current_state_changed_threshold_) || (pose2d.y < current_state_(1) - current_state_changed_threshold_)) ||
136  ((pose2d.theta > current_state_(2) + current_state_changed_threshold_) || (pose2d.theta < current_state_(2) - current_state_changed_threshold_)))
137  {
138 
139 
140 
141  std::cout << "---------------------------------------------------"
142  << std::endl
143  << "Phase 1 - Prediction Phase" << std::endl
144  << std::endl;
145 
146  std::cout << "Step 1 - Update current state using the odometry data:" << std::endl
147  << std::endl;
148 
149  std::cout << "Old state" << std::endl
150  << std::endl;
151 
152  std::cout << "X: " << current_state_(0) << std::endl;
153  std::cout << "Y: " << current_state_(1) << std::endl;
154  std::cout << "Theta: " << current_state_(2) << std::endl
155  << std::endl;
156 
157  //Update current position with odometry reading
158  current_state_(0) = pose2d.x;
159  current_state_(1) = pose2d.y;
160  current_state_(2) = pose2d.theta;
161 
162  std::cout << "New state" << std::endl
163  << std::endl;
164 
165  std::cout << "X: " << current_state_(0) << std::endl;
166  std::cout << "Y: " << current_state_(1) << std::endl;
167  std::cout << "Theta: " << current_state_(2) << std::endl
168  << std::endl;
169 
171  }
172  }
173 
174 private:
175  // TimeSynchronizer
176  message_filters::Subscriber<cares_msgs::ArucoMarkers> aruco_sub_;
177  message_filters::Subscriber<nav_msgs::Odometry> odom_sub_;
178  typedef message_filters::TimeSynchronizer<cares_msgs::ArucoMarkers, nav_msgs::Odometry> sync_policy_;
179  std::shared_ptr<sync_policy_> sync;
181  // Range bearing
182  Eigen::Vector2d range_bearing_landmark_h_ = Eigen::Vector2d(0,0);
183  Eigen::Vector2d range_bearing_data_association_z_ = Eigen::Vector2d(0,0);
184 
185  // Robot state
186  Eigen::VectorXd current_state_ = Eigen::VectorXd(3);
187  double current_state_changed_threshold_ = 0.01;
188 };
189 
190 int main(int argc, char **argv)
191 {
192  ros::init(argc, argv, "vision_node");
193 
194  ros::NodeHandle nh;
195 
196  EkfSlam ekf_slam(nh);
197 
198  ros::spin();
199 
200  return 0;
201 }
